sqlMap.select: SELECT AUDIT_TRAIL_ID AS auditTrailId, UPDATED_BY AS updatedBy, TABLE_NAME AS tableName, FIELD_NAME AS fieldName, OLD_VALUE AS oldValue, NEW_VALUE AS newValue, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS updateDateInString, FGETGENERALCODECAPTION(CHANGE_TYPE) AS changeType, DATA_ID AS dataId FROM AUDIT_TRAIL WHERE TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') < TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - TO_NUMBER(FGETGENERALPARAMETERVALUE('logKeepingDays'))),'yyyy-MM-dd')
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM AUDIT_TRAIL WHERE TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') < TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - TO_NUMBER(FGETGENERALPARAMETERVALUE('logKeepingDays'))),'yyyy-MM-dd')
